name: cz-conventional-changelog-lint
description: Let an interactive command line interface help you with creating commit messages matching your conventional-changelog-lint configuration.

scripts.prebuild: parallelshell 'npm run test' 'npm run clean && npm run prepare'
scripts.postbuild: npm run typings && npm run copy && npm run notify
scripts.test: (eslint source/**/*.js && remark *.md -u remark-lint) && echo '' || notify -t $npm_package_name -m 'Linting failed! ðŸ˜¢'
scripts.notify: echo 'Build ready, happy hacking! âœŠ' && notify -t $npm_package_name -m 'Build ready, happy hacking! âœŠ'
scripts.push:
git push && git push --tags && hub release create "v$(cat .git/RELEASE_VERSION.tmp)" --message="v$(cat .git/RELEASE_VERSION.tmp)
$(cat .git/COMMITMSG.tmp)" && cd ./distribution && npm publish && cd ../ && rm .git/RELEASE_VERSION.tmp && rm .git/COMMITMSG.tmp
scripts.version: npm run changelog && git add . && echo "$(conventional-changelog -p angular)" > .git/COMMITMSG.tmp
scripts.postversion:
echo $(git log -1 --pretty=%B HEAD^..HEAD) > .git/RELEASE_VERSION.tmp && git tag -d v$(cat .git/RELEASE_VERSION.tmp) && git commit --amend -m "chore(release): $(cat .git/RELEASE_VERSION.tmp)
$(cat .git/COMMITMSG.tmp)" && git tag -a v$(cat .git/RELEASE_VERSION.tmp) -m "$(cat .git/COMMITMSG.tmp)"

author: Mario Nebl <hello@herebecode.com>
